pageTitle: Office of the Executive Vice President and Provost: For Faculty
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {62335=For more information or questions, please contact: Larry Smith Executive Senior Vice Provost Utah State University 1435 Old Main Hill Logan, UT 84322-1435 Phone: (435) 797-0718 Email: larry.smith@usu.edu}
textBeforeTable: College of Agriculture and Applied Sciences College List of Ombudspersons The USU ADVANCE team produced a video that depicts faculty evaluation scenarios that demonstrate the advantages of an ombudsperson system here at Utah State University. CLICK HERE to view this important video. All Colleges, Extension, and the Libraries will appoint ombudspersons to serve in the Promotion, Tenure, and Post-Tenure Review processes. The ombudsperson is responsible for ensuring that the rights of the candidate and the University are protected and that due process is followed according to the Faculty Code.
